forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 57. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 44. West southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of downtown San Francisco, the afternoon emerges as a vivid tapestry of sunlit warmth and crisp air, offering a welcome embrace after the coolness of the morning fog. As the day unfolds, the clarity above invites a sense of optimism, with nary a cloud to mar the brilliant blue sky. Against this backdrop, gentle northwest breezes stir, whispering promises of adventure for those passing through the city’s bustling streets.

As twilight nears, the scene stays clear, with only a hint of the marine layer retreating into the bay’s folds. With temperatures expected to dip into the cool 40s tonight, a light jacket or sweater would be wise when stepping out after dark. The charm of this day beckons for leisurely strolls along the waterfront, where the shimmering waters team with life, or perhaps a quiet moment spent in one of the city’s many parks, where fragrant blooms and budding trees inspire serenity. A visit to a cozy café, where warmth from the inside mingles with the fresh aroma of brewed coffee, would also suit this temperate backdrop perfectly, providing comfort as day turns to night.
